name: Root Cause GGJ2023
description:
Submission for the Global Game Jam 2023

A 3D strategy game where you manage your roots to reach the main enemy base and destroy them. Defend against enemies with towers that are left behind for you to take over with your roots. And capture other buildings to gain more roots.

WASD - camera controls

Left Mouse - place vines on the ground 

Credits: 

Vytautas Gružauskas - Management, programming

Mykolas Benjaminas Meškas - Programming

Airidas Leonavičius - Programming

Rokas Barodicas - Programming

Arnas Vizgirda - 3D modelling

Kamilė Šmatavičiūtė - 3D modelling
